title: ‘I Better Just Try’: Wout van Aert Snags First Win of 2024 After Last-Minute Switch
content:
With Omloop Het Nieuwsblad and the spring classics on the horizon, the Belgian superstar snags an unexpected win: 'This gives a lot of confidence.'

Read the full article at ‘I Better Just Try’: Wout van Aert Snags First Win of 2024 After Last-Minute Switch on Velo.
author: ahood
